Title: Increases medicaid reimbursement payment aggregate for private duty nursing services and care
Summary: Increases medicaid reimbursement payment aggregate for private duty nursing services and care by 15 million dollars for period 7/1/22 to 3/31/23, and by 20 million dollars annually thereafter for each period from April 1 to March 31.
LawCode: Add ยง365-o, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to medicaid reimbursement of private duty nursing services and care
